'''Auāta''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|Murmurs of tense discussion slow to a halt as a woman at the head of the crowd steps forward clutching a spear.}}
She feels threatened by the presence of the Watcher, as an outsider in Ori o Koīki. [Apāro](/aparo/) tries to talk her down by convincing her that they are no better than the outsiders if the Mataru act like inhospitable savages, without courtesy or welcome.

}}

{{Description|Murmurs of tense discussion slow to a halt as a woman at the head of the crowd steps forward clutching a spear.}}
She feels threatened by the presence of the Watcher, as an outsider in Ori o Koīki. [[Apāro]] tries to talk her down by convincing her that they are no better than the outsiders if the Mataru act like inhospitable savages, without courtesy or welcome.
